M. BIANCHI OF CALIFORNIA, Appellant, v. Donald H. RUMSFELD, Secretary of Defense, Appellee. No. 01-1319. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 11, 2002.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, BRYSON, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
